trans-unit.source: Displays the values of a single record from a data source using user-defined templates.
trans-unit.target: 利用使用者定義的範本，顯示資料來源中單一記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項可讓您編輯、刪除及插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Templates](#templates)
trans-unit.target: [範本](#templates)

trans-unit.source: [Binding to Data](#binding_to_data)
trans-unit.target: [繫結至資料](#binding_to_data)

trans-unit.source: [Data Operations](#data_operations)
trans-unit.target: [資料作業](#data_operations)

trans-unit.source: [Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface)
trans-unit.target: [自訂使用者介面](#customizing_the_user_interface)

trans-unit.source: [Events](#events)
trans-unit.target: [事件](#events)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles)
trans-unit.target: [套用 CSS 樣式](#applying_styles)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is used to display a single record from a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項用來顯示資料來源的單一記錄。

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, except it displays user-defined templates instead of row fields.
trans-unit.target: 類似於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制，但是它會顯示使用者定義的範本，而不是資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: Creating your own templates gives you greater flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 建立您自己的範本，讓您更大的彈性來控制資料的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control supports the following features:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項支援下列功能：

trans-unit.source: Binding to data source controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料來源控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: Built-in inserting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 內建的插入功能。

trans-unit.source: Built-in updating and deleting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 內建更新和刪除功能。

trans-unit.source: Built-in paging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 內建的分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: Programmatic access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性、 處理事件，等等。

trans-unit.source: Customizable appearance through user-defined templates, themes, and styles.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用者定義的範本、 主題和樣式的可自訂外觀。

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: 範本

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to display content, you need to create templates for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來顯示內容，您必須建立控制項的不同部分的範本。

trans-unit.source: Most templates are optional; however, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的範本是選擇性的。不過，您必須建立的範本，以及設定控制項的模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control that supports inserting records must have an insert item template defined.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>支援記錄插入控制項必須具有定義的插入項目範本。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different templates that you can create.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出您可以建立不同的範本。

trans-unit.source: Template type
trans-unit.target: 範本類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 定義資料的內容資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can edit an existing record.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含輸入的控制項和命令按鈕的使用者可以編輯現有的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the empty data row displayed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 定義的內容，空白資料列會顯示當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains content to alert the user that the data source does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含來提醒使用者資料來源不包含任何記錄的內容。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 定義頁尾資料列的內容。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含您想要顯示頁尾資料列中的任何其他內容。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**或者，您可以只指定要設定頁尾資料列中顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the header row.
trans-unit.target: 定義標頭資料列的內容。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含您想要在標頭資料列中顯示的任何其他內容。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**或者，您可以只指定要設定標頭列中顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 定義資料的內容資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains content to display the values of an existing record.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含用來顯示現有記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 定義資料的內容資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can add a new record.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含輸入的控制項和命令按鈕的使用者可以加入新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content for the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 定義啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列的內容 (當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性設定為`true`)。

trans-unit.source: This template usually contains controls with which the user can navigate to another record.
trans-unit.target: 此範本通常包含的控制項的使用者可以瀏覽至另一筆記錄。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has a built-in pager row user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: **注意：** <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項的內建的頁面巡覽區列使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: You need to create a pager template only if you want to create your own custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 您要建立頁面巡覽區範本，只有當您想要建立您自己的自訂頁面巡覽區資料列。

trans-unit.source: To display the value of a field in an item template, use a data binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示的欄位值中的項目範本，請使用資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on data binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。

trans-unit.source: Input controls in the edit item template and insert item template can be bound to the fields of a data source by using a two-way binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 編輯項目樣板和插入項目樣板中的輸入的控制項可以繫結至資料來源的欄位使用雙向繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>自動擷取更新的輸入控制項的值或插入作業的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Two-way binding expressions also allow input controls in an edit item template to automatically display the original field values.
trans-unit.target: 雙向繫結運算式也可以讓輸入的控制項中自動顯示原始欄位值的編輯項目範本。

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: Binding to Data
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can be bound to a data source control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) or to any data source collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or other collection types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項可以繫結至資料來源控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 或任何資料來源集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面，例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或其他集合型別。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the appropriate data source type:
trans-unit.target: 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項至適當的資料來源類型：

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>資料來源控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項，並可使用的資料來源控制項的功能，以執行插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to bind to data.
trans-unit.target: 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the data source and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料來源實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面，以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When using this method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control does not provide built-in inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: 當使用此方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項不提供內建的插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 您需要提供此功能使用適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control.
trans-unit.target: 可能的話，強烈建議，值經過 HTML 編碼，才能讓它們顯示在這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。

trans-unit.source: Data Operations
trans-unit.target: 資料作業

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項提供許多內建功能可讓使用者更新、 刪除、 插入和控制項中的項目頁面上。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is bound to a data source control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項所繫結至資料來源控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新、 刪除、 插入和分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項可以為 update、 delete、 insert 和分頁作業與其他類型的資料來源提供的支援; 不過，您必須提供適當的事件處理常式，實作這些作業。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate command buttons to perform updating, deleting, or inserting operations.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項使用的範本，它不提供自動產生命令按鈕來執行更新、 刪除或插入作業的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must manually include these command buttons in the appropriate template.
trans-unit.target: 您必須手動加入這些命令按鈕，在適當的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control recognizes certain buttons that have their `CommandName` properties set to specific values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項辨認某些按鈕具有其`CommandName`屬性設定為特定值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the command buttons that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的命令按鈕的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項辨認。

trans-unit.source: Button
trans-unit.target: 按鈕

trans-unit.source: CommandName value
trans-unit.target: CommandName 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source: "Cancel"
trans-unit.target: [取消]

trans-unit.source: Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取消作業，並捨棄使用者所輸入的值，更新或插入作業中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control then returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制然後傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: 刪除

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: "Delete"

trans-unit.source: Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 用於刪除作業，以刪除資料來源中顯示的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Edit
trans-unit.target: Edit

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: [編輯]

trans-unit.source: Used in updating operations to put the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 在更新作業中用來放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The content specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the data row.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>屬性會顯示為資料列。

trans-unit.source: Insert
trans-unit.target: Insert

trans-unit.source: "Insert"
trans-unit.target: 「 插入 」

trans-unit.source: Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source using the values provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用於插入作業，以嘗試使用由使用者所提供的值的資料來源中插入新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: New
trans-unit.target: 新增

trans-unit.source: "New"
trans-unit.target: "New"

trans-unit.source: Used in inserting operations to put the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 在插入作業中用來放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>在插入模式下的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The content specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the data row.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>屬性會顯示為資料列。

trans-unit.source: Page
trans-unit.target: 頁面

trans-unit.source: "Page"
trans-unit.target: 「 頁面 」

trans-unit.source: Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging.
trans-unit.target: 用於分頁作業，以代表執行分頁的頁面巡覽列中按鈕。

trans-unit.source: To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate.
trans-unit.target: 指定的分頁作業，請設定`CommandArgument`下一步 」、 「 Prev"、"First"、 「 最後 」，或要瀏覽頁面的索引按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**這種類型的按鈕通常只用於頁面巡覽區範本。

trans-unit.source: Update
trans-unit.target: 更新

trans-unit.source: "Update"
trans-unit.target: 「 更新 」

trans-unit.source: Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用於更新作業，以嘗試更新資料來源中顯示的記錄，使用者所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the displayed record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 [刪除] 按鈕 （這會立即刪除顯示的記錄），按一下 [編輯] 或 [新增] 按鈕時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>編輯，或分別插入模式中，控制項便會進入。

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the content contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the current data item.
trans-unit.target: 在編輯模式中，內容包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>屬性會顯示目前的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the edit item template is defined such that the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，編輯項目樣板會定義成將 編輯 按鈕會取代的更新 和 取消 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control) are also usually displayed with a field's value for the user to modify.
trans-unit.target: 輸入適用於該欄位的資料類型的控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制項) 通常也會顯示與使用者修改欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 更新 按鈕更新資料來源中的記錄，而按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有變更。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the content contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the data item when the control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，將中所包含的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>控制項處於插入模式時，將會顯示之資料項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The insert item template is typically defined such that the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record.
trans-unit.target: 插入項目範本通常是在 新增 按鈕會取代 Insert 和 取消 5d; 按鈕，而使用者輸入新記錄的值會顯示空白的輸入的控制項的定義。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 插入 按鈕在資料來源插入記錄，而按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項提供分頁功能，可讓使用者巡覽至其他資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, a pager row is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control that contains the page navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，頁面巡覽列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>包含頁面導覽控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用分頁，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the pager row by setting the properties of objects contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂頁面巡覽列中包含的物件屬性來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in pager row UI, you can create your own UI by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽列 UI，您可以建立自己的 UI 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the User Interface
trans-unit.target: 自訂使用者介面

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定為資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the data source does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列中顯示的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制當資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the footer row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the header row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定為資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the pager row displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽列中顯示的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制啟用分頁功能時。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定為資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: Events
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control provides several events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於在控制項中按下按鈕時執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objects are created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在所有發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件都會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於顯示之前修改記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於刪除 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於插入按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項插入資料錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 發生於更新 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項更新資料列。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的更新 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制更新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode).
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更模式 （若要編輯、 插入或唯讀模式）。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來執行工作時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode).
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更模式 （若要編輯、 插入或唯讀模式）。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel a mode change.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> 控制項處理分頁作業之前。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Applying CSS Styles
trans-unit.target: 套用 CSS 樣式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用範本自訂外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項，您可以指定 CSS 樣式中的範本中的標記。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.RenderOuterTable%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to display the values from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來顯示的值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to edit existing records.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來編輯現有的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The control in this example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中的控制項有一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅的文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項以插入新記錄。

trans-unit.source: The control in this example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中的控制項有一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅的文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>類別。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of a container control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項的頁面，建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>物件、 設定其屬性，並再將它加入<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>容器集合控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以動態方式新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable the paging feature; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示啟用分頁功能，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項具有內建的分頁功能，可讓使用者瀏覽至不同資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface or a data source that supports paging capability.
trans-unit.target: 分頁功能可以搭配任何支援的資料來源物件<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面或支援的資料來源分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: To enable the paging feature, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用分頁功能，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以判斷基礎資料來源中的項目總數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前所顯示的項目索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁時，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列包含頁面導覽控制項，而且可以顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。

trans-unit.source: The pager row has four built-in pager display modes.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列有四個內建的頁面巡覽，顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the four modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述四種模式。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.
trans-unit.target: 一組分頁控制項包含上一個和下一步 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.
trans-unit.target: 一組分頁控制項，包含先前，接下來，第一個和最後一個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly.
trans-unit.target: 一組分頁控制項，包含用於直接存取頁面的編號連結按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This is the default mode.
trans-unit.target: 此為預設模式。

trans-unit.source: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.
trans-unit.target: 一組編號，第一個和最後一個連結按鈕所組成的重新編頁控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項自動隱藏頁面巡覽列，當資料來源包含兩個以上的記錄。

trans-unit.source: You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來控制的設定 （例如頁面巡覽區顯示模式，在時間和頁面巡覽區控制項的文字標籤顯示的頁面連結數目） 的頁面巡覽列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color and font color), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列 （包括其背景色彩和字型色彩），使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項也可讓您定義的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本。

trans-unit.source: For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區列範本的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用分頁發生時執行自訂動作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> 控制項處理分頁作業之前。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: These events are not raised when you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更時，不會引發這些事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property to enable the paging feature in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性來啟用中的分頁功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display in the background of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項背景之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image to display in the background of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項背景之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示的背景影像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the image is tiled to fill in the background.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的映像小於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項，影像會並排顯示以在背景填滿。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the control, the image is cropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像大於此控制項，則會裁剪影像。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A> property to display a custom image in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A>屬性，在背景中顯示的自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> object that represents the pager row displayed at the bottom of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> 物件，表示顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項下方的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> object that represents the bottom pager row of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> 物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項下方的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁時 (當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性設定為`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他記錄，並可顯示頂端、 底部，或同時上方和底部的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件，表示內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理下方的頁面巡覽區列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the bottom pager row has been created; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>底端頁面巡覽區列表示物件已建立; 否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property to access the pager row displayed at the bottom of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性來存取在底部顯示的頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row is then updated with additional content.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區資料列則會更新與其他內容中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項之 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供具有可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的資料表描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: Additional accessibility support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他可存取性支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項由提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text for the HTML caption element rendered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>屬性的 HTML 標題項目呈現在指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項中 HTML 標題項目的水平或垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表底端對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element's alignment is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定標題項目對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, the default value of the browser is used.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`，會使用瀏覽器的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Additional accessibility support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他可存取性支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項由提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify that the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control should be rendered on the left side of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項應該呈現控制項的左邊。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A> property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A>屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項具有相同的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between cells, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整儲存格之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is not set, the default value of the browser is used.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性未在設定中時，瀏覽器會使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A> property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A>屬性，以指定的儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的間距大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之間的間距數量，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A> property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，即可控制中的相鄰資料格之間的間距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格間距是一致的整個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定個別資料格的資料列或資料行之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value greater than 0, and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定這個屬性的值大於 0，，然後再設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.GridLines%2A>屬性相鄰的資料格的框線之間顯示儲存格框線的值，顯示間隔。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A> property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性控制的差距大小。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A> property to specify the amount of spacing between adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，以指定的相鄰的儲存格之間的間距大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Switches the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control to the specified data-entry mode.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項切換至指定的資料輸入模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A> method to programmatically switch the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control between edit, insert, and read-only modes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>方法來以程式設計方式切換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method also updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property with the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性以指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events are not raised when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>呼叫此方法時，不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to read-only mode whenever the user navigates to another record.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項為唯讀模式，每當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the data source used to create the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，表示用來建立控制階層架構的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the control hierarchy is created directly from the data source; <see langword="false" /> to indicate the control hierarchy is created from the view state.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示控制階層架構是直接從資料來源建立，<see langword="false" /> 則表示控制階層架構是從檢視狀態建立。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制階層架構，用來呈現具有指定資料來源的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The number of items created from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源建立的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateChildControls%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateChildControls%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項建立的控制項階層架構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the `dataBinding` parameter is `true`, data binding is performed before the control hierarchy is created.
trans-unit.target: 當`dataBinding`參數是`true`，建立在控制項階層架構之前執行資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control is bound is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，其為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的繫結目標。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default table style object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的預設資料表樣式物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the default table style for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的預設資料表樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create its default table style object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來建立其預設資料表樣式物件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to setting the default style of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object, this method also sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 除了設定的預設樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>物件，這個方法也會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A>屬性設為 0。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own default style.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法，以建立您自己的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that contains the arguments that are passed to the data source for processing.
trans-unit.target: 建立包含引數的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 物件，這些引數已傳遞至資料來源進行處理。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> that contains the arguments that are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" />，這些引數已傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that contains the arguments passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件，其中包含引數傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object contains the arguments for paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件包含分頁作業的引數。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> class, you can override this method to specify your own values that are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法，以指定您自己會傳遞至資料來源的值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示之資料項目以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> object using the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用指定項目索引、資料列型別和資料列狀態的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> with the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" />，具有指定的項目索引、資料列型別和資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object used to represent a row within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件用來表示控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> class, you can override this method to return a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> object with custom settings.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" />利用自訂設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the containing table for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的包含資料表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> that represents the containing table for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的包含資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateTable%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create a table that acts as the container for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateTable%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來建立資料表做為控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current data-entry mode of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項目前的資料輸入模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: This value is normally set automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個值通常自動設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制當新增、 更新、 插入、 刪除或取消命令按鈕。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes in response to an action, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更以回應動作的模式，則下表中的事件會引發。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs the appropriate routine when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式，事件發生時執行適當的常式。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes, but after the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更模式，但模式變更之後。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to perform a task whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來執行工作時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes, but before the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項變更模式，但模式變更之前。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to cancel the mode change.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。

trans-unit.source: **Note** These events are not raised when you change the mode programmatically by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**模式變更以程式設計方式使用時，不會引發這些事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: If the user attempts to navigate to another record while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit more, the paging operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至另一個記錄 while<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項是在 編輯多個，已取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將資料來源繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataBind> method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataBind>方法將資料繫結至資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會解析所有資料繫結運算式在使用中的範本中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data item bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItem%2A> property to access the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItem%2A>屬性來存取資料的項目繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data item is often used to access the field values of the current record directly.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目通常用於直接存取目前記錄的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref:System.Object> returned by this property varies depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Object>傳回此屬性會根據資料來源而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項，<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>物件傳回。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only after data binding has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 只有在發生資料繫結之後，才使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Before data binding occurs, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結之前，這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This property is also not applicable when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，也不適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式，並傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItem%2A> property to determine the value of a field in the data item.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItem%2A>屬性來判斷資料的項目中欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of data items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源中的資料項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of data items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的資料項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItemCount%2A> property to determine the number of data items contained in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItemCount%2A>屬性來判斷資料的資料來源中所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the data item bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料項目的索引，該資料項目從資料來源繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data item bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料項目的索引，該資料項目從資料來源繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性來判斷資料項目的索引繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制從資料來源。
